mapper.insert: INSERT INTO good (good_id, name, price, description, shop_id, remainder) VALUES (#{goodId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{shopId}, #{remainder} )
mapper.select: SELECT g.good_id, g.name, g.price, g.status, g.description, g.shop_id, g.sales, g.remainder, g.create_time, s.name as "shop.name" FROM good g INNER JOIN shop s ON g.shop_id = s.shop_id WHERE g.good_id = #{goodId}
